channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 21:09 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 21:09 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 21:08 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Manganets and Manganetsk Territorial Community - Myrivsk Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivsk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 21:08 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m.
